title: MoonPay Says CFTC’s Caroline Pham Will Join Crypto Payments Firm
description: MoonPay Inc. said Caroline Pham, the acting chairman of the Commodity Futures Trading Commission, will join the crypto payments firm as its chief legal officer.
content: MoonPay Inc. said Caroline Pham, the acting chairman of the Commodity Futures Trading Commission, will join the crypto payments firm as its chief legal officer.
